t: How to buy a graphics card from Amazon before a 'scalpers' bot - Quora
s: Answer: There's really no way you can, unless you set up a bot of your own. Even then, your chances are pretty slim, as there's so many sniping bots vying for the same graphics card. Your best shot is to sign up for a wait list like EVGA has, where they'll email you when inventory is available. ...
